localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: HypeDocs is a web app that allows you to write down your accomplishments - personal or professional - throughout your day so they don’t get lost or forgotten. You’ll get weekly reminders of past achievements, and can celebrate your wins with our community.
blogPost.body: HypeDocs is a web app that allows you to write down your accomplishments - personal or professional - throughout your day so they don’t get lost or forgotten. You’ll get weekly reminders of past achievements, and can celebrate your wins with our community.
blogPost.title: HypeDocs - Track achievements, gain confidence, beat imposter syndrome
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: HypeDocs 是一款网络应用程序，让您可以在一天中写下您的个人或职业成就，这样就不会丢失或遗忘这些成就。您将每周收到过去成就的提醒，并可以与我们的社区一起庆祝您的胜利。
localize.tagline: 追踪成就，获得自信，战胜冒牌货综合症。

localize.description: HypeDocs 是一款網絡應用程序，讓您可以在一天中寫下您的個人或職業成就，這樣就不會丟失或遺忘這些成就。您將每週收到過去成就的提醒，並可以與我們的社區一起慶祝您的勝利。
localize.tagline: 追蹤成就，獲得自信，戰勝冒牌貨綜合症。

previous.excerpt: The Collections database consists of entries for more than 480,000 works in the Musée du Louvre and Musée National Eugène-Delacroix. Updated on a daily basis, it is the result of the continuous research and documentation efforts carried out by both museums.
previous.title: Louvre Museum Online - Explore the entirety of the Louvre's collection for free

localize.description: 藏品数据库包括卢浮宫博物馆和欧仁-德拉克洛瓦国家博物馆480,000多件作品的条目。该数据库每天更新，是两个博物馆不断进行研究和文献工作的结果。
localize.tagline: 免费探索卢浮宫的全部藏品。

localize.description: 藏品數據庫包括盧浮宮博物館和歐仁-德拉克洛瓦國家博物館480,000多件作品的條目。該數據庫每天更新，是兩個博物館不斷進行研究和文獻工作的結果。
localize.tagline: 免費探索盧浮宮的全部藏品。

localize.full_text: UBER EATS 司機被殺，我的車jacking。兇手抱怨說她失去了電話，因爲男人在地板上扭轉。DC NATL守衛什麼都不做https://t.co/ZTlhgZ0fkj。
localize.quoted_status_full_text: 他們在華盛頓謀殺了一名Uber Eats司機，https://t.co/Zz7xOu0Piv。
